caption:
This photograph captures an outdoor scenic view featuring railroad tracks and a mountainous landscape. The foreground prominently displays three sets of curving railroad tracks that lead into the distance towards a group of industrial structures. The tracks create a leading line towards a central mill or mining facility, characterized by large, metal frameworks and several levels of construction.

The mill is positioned on the slope of a mountain, with part of a bridge visible extending over a body of water. Surrounding the industrial site, the landscape features partial snow coverage and sparse vegetation, indicating a colder, possibly alpine environment.

In the background, a mountain rises steeply, with patches of snow scattered across its surface, indicating either late winter or early spring conditions. The sky above is bright and partly cloudy, suggesting a crisp day.

No people are visible in the image, emphasizing the solitude of the industrial setting within a natural environment. The overall composition blends elements of industrial activity with the ruggedness of the natural, mountainous terrain.
title: Colorado Fuel and Iron Co. feldspar mine on Monarch Pass (infrared photograph)
